concept.title: Kerberos Authentication for the Cluster
concept.shortdesc: If the YARN cluster uses Kerberos authentication, make sure to configure the to use Kerberos authentication.

conbody.p: Kerberos authenticationcluster pipelinescluster modeKerberos authenticationWhen you configure Kerberos authentication for the , you enable the to use Kerberos and define the principal and keytab. When Kerberos is enabled for the , the automatically uses Kerberos principal and keytab to connect to any YARN cluster that uses Kerberos.
